allow-half.description: Whether or not to allow half selection

:low-threshold.description: The cut-off values for low and medium scores, and the values themselves are divided into low scores
:low-threshold.description_zh: 低分和中等分数的界限值，值本身被划分在低分中

:high-threshold.description: The cut-off value for the high and medium scores, and the value itself is divided into the high score
:high-threshold.description_zh: 高分和中等分数的界限值，值本身被划分在高分中

:colors.description: icon. If you pass in an array, there are 3 elements, which are the colors corresponding to the 3 segments; If you pass in an object, you can customize the segment, the key name is the boundary value of the segment, and the key value is the corresponding color
:colors.description_zh: icon 的颜色。若传入数组，共有 3 个元素，为 3 个分段所对应的颜色；若传入对象，可自定义分段，键名为分段的界限值，键值为对应的颜色

void-color.description: The color of the icon is unchecked
void-color.description_zh: 未选中 icon 的颜色

disabled-void-color.description: The color of the icon is not selected when read-only
disabled-void-color.description_zh: 只读时未选中 icon 的颜色

:icon-classes.description: icon. If you pass in an array, there are 3 elements, which are the class names corresponding to the 3 segments; If you pass in an object, you can customize the segment, the key name is the boundary value of the segment, and the key value is the corresponding class name
:icon-classes.description_zh: icon 的类名。若传入数组，共有 3 个元素，为 3 个分段所对应的类名；若传入对象，可自定义分段，键名为分段的界限值，键值为对应的类名

void-icon-class.description: The class name of the icon is unchecked
void-icon-class.description_zh: 未选中 icon 的类名

disabled-void-icon-class.description: The class name of icon is not selected when read-only
disabled-void-icon-class.description_zh: 只读时未选中 icon 的类名

show-text.description: Whether or not to display auxiliary text, if true, the text content corresponding to the current score will be selected from the texts array
show-text.description_zh: 是否显示辅助文字，若为真，则会从 texts 数组中选取当前分数对应的文字内容

show-score.description: Whether to show the current score, show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time
show-score.description_zh: 是否显示当前分数，show-score 和 show-text 不能同时为真

text-color.description: The color of the secondary text

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the score is changed
